title: Pixel 3 Various problems
content:
1) During the call using PSTN I ear a frying noise but dont happend using voice application like whatsapp call.
2) The Pixel 3 loses signal very often in areas that the Pixel 2 XL did not lose.
3) When I am driving I use always Android Auto and when I do or recive a call the GPS signal it stops working, obviously when cut the call the gps starts working again. This did not happen in Pixel 2 XL.
